last_episode_to_air.name: Coraggio
last_episode_to_air.overview: Anna Colace suffers a setback with Giuseppina. Maria Concetta fights against her new life in isolation and Denise returns to Dalia Masi in order to honour her mother’s memory.

name: The Good Mothers
overview: The true story of three courageous women inside the notorious Calabrian ‘Ndrangheta mafia, working with newly-minted female prosecutor, Alessandra Cerreti, to bring down down the criminal empire.
tagline: The women who dared to defy the mafia.

episodes.name: Nella Bocca Del Lupo
episodes.overview: Anna Colace prepares a revolutionary strategy to challenge the ‘Ndrangheta. Lea Garofalo and her daughter Denise reconnect with their husband and father, Carlo Cosco, hoping to reconcile and put an end to their years of living on the run.

episodes.name: Famiglia E Lealta
episodes.overview: Denise is catapulted into an unknown world after a devastating tragedy. Meanwhile, Anna initiates a surveillance operation on the women of the ‘Ndrangheta, focusing on Giuseppina Pesce and Maria Concetta Cacciola.

episodes.name: Un'altra Vita
episodes.overview: When migrants whom the Ndrangheta have exploited spill out into the streets to protest their working conditions, Anna makes a risky phone call to accelerate a new phase of her operation. The search for Lea makes significant progress in the meantime.

episodes.name: Tradimento
episodes.overview: As the Pesce clan falters after Giuseppina’s arrest, Anna turns her attention to another potential witness: Maria Concetta Cacciola. In the meantime, Denise leaves Reggio Calabria to meet an old acquaintance.

episodes.name: Madri e figli
episodes.overview: Giuseppina’s decision to collaborate enables Anna to attack members of the ‘Ndrangheta clans. Her tactics clash with those in the media. Maria Concetta takes matters into her own hands, Giuseppina faces a new challenge and Denise learns a shocking secret.

episodes.name: Coraggio
episodes.overview: Anna Colace suffers a setback with Giuseppina. Maria Concetta fights against her new life in isolation and Denise returns to Dalia Masi in order to honour her mother’s memory.
